scripts.test: npm run test:unit && npm run test:doc && npm run docs
scripts.docs: cp README.md.header README.md && for f in src/*; do transcribe --url 'https://github.com/fantasyland/fantasy-birds/blob/master/{filename}#L{line}' -- ${f} >> README.md ; done
scripts.patch-release: npm version patch && npm publish && git push --follow-tags
scripts.minor-release: npm version minor && npm publish && git push --follow-tags
scripts.major-release: npm version major && npm publish && git push --follow-tags
